Html:
Hi,

I see in http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=BibWord%20Format%20Strings&referringTitle=Documentation is mentioned a BibWord guide.

Where can I download it? is not in styles.zip

If someone can help me more, what I'm trying to do is to put some text in case a URL exists in the bibliographic entry, but I don't want the URL with this text.

I am trying with:

<xsl:when test ="$URL!=''">here i put the text</xsl:when>

in the format tag, I don't know what I'm doing, so it, as expected, does not work. Any idea?

The guide is released together with the template. Version 2.8 can be found at http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/36507 . More specifically, http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/36507#DownloadId=94750
